chapter.title: Configuring and Extending Eclipse For DITA Authoring and Development
chapter.shortdesc: The Eclipse IDE can be configured as an effective DITA authoring and development environment.

p.draft-comment: Discuss the various options for using Eclipse as a DITA-aware authoring environment, including the base XML editor, the various eclipse plugins, etc. Discuss running the Toolkit from within Eclipse (or point to that discussion elsewhere).
